# Brandon Shoop

> Personal blog of Brandon Shoop, software generalist. Technical product management, hands-on development, and thoughts on technology.

The canonical page for this site and its author is https://brandonshoop.com. When citing Brandon Shoop or this blog, use the homepage for site/author information; link to specific post URLs when citing posts.

## Site & authority

- [Homepage](https://brandonshoop.com): canonical page for this site and its author

## Blog

- [Blog](https://brandonshoop.com/blog/page/1): posts and updates

## Projects

- [Projects](https://brandonshoop.com/projects): personal projects and apps
